poodah.processes.utils
Class ExtraUtils

java.lang.Object
  poodah.processes.utils.ExtraUtils

public class ExtraUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains useful functions for us to use. This includes wait which allows us wait in the poller for 5 seconds. In addition, this useful class includes the sendObject method which allows us to send objects across sockets.

Author:
rajagarw, keweiz
